sentence.Network_en: Action is consolatory. It is the enemy of thought and the friend of flattering illusions.
sentence.Network_cn: 行动是可以慰藉的. 它是思想的敌人,是幻想的朋友.

sentence.Network_en: Action is consolatory. It is the enemy of thought and the friend of glittering illusions.
sentence.Network_cn: 行动是令人安慰的, 它是思想的敌人,是美好幻想的朋友.

auth_sentence.content: Harold writes a consolatory note to her, but on his way to the post box, he decides he must deliver it to her in person.
